translation:
Select folders to show PMX/PMD/X models in a tree.
Click a tree item or use Up/Down to switch the model.
Right-click for Copy Full Path or Save Screenshot.

Validates the model file path and shows the result in the message area.
No settings are saved; only a beep is played.

id: モデルファイルを選択してください
translation:
Please select a model file. Pmx or Pmd files can be opened.
・You can set the Pmx/Pmd model to be applied when opening a motion.
・Click the save button to save the model path and close the window.

id: モーションファイルを選択してください
translation:
Please select a motion file.
Vmd or Vpd files can be opened.

id: 保存エラーメッセージ
translation:
Failed to save model settings.

Error message: {{.Error}}

Failed to save model settings.
Please check if the correct model path is specified.

Model path: %s
Bones that exist in both the motion and the model.
Morphs that exist in both the motion and the model.
Bones that exist in the motion but not in the model.
Morphs that exist in the motion but not in the model.

Model settings have been successfully saved.
Please close the window.
If you have not yet associated the file extension, please do so.

Model path: %s

id: IK・外部親なし保存失敗
translation: Failed to save IK/No External Parent Motion

id: IK・外部親なし保存エラーメッセージ
translation: Failed to save IK/No External Parent Motion

id: IK・外部親なし保存失敗メッセージ
translation:
Failed to save IK/No External Parent Motion
Please check if the correct motion path is specified

Motion path: %s

id: IK・外部親なし保存成功
translation: Successfully saved IK/No External Parent Motion

id: IK・外部親なし保存成功メッセージ
translation:
Successfully saved IK/No External Parent Motion
Please close the window

Motion path: %s

id: IK・外部親なしモーション保存
IK・外部親なしモーション保存説明
translation:
Saves a motion with IK and external parent keyframes removed as _safe.
Visibility on/off is preserved.

id: OKボーン一覧の更新に失敗しました: %s
translation: Failed to update OK bone list: %s

id: OKモーフ一覧の更新に失敗しました: %s
translation: Failed to update OK morph list: %s

id: NGボーン一覧の更新に失敗しました: %s
translation: Failed to update NG bone list: %s

id: NGモーフ一覧の更新に失敗しました: %s
translation: Failed to update NG morph list: %s
Select folders to search for models. Drag & drop supports multiple folders.
Select a VMD/VPD to apply to the current model. If not set, the model is shown in the default pose.

Shows models under the selected folders in a tree. Click or use Up/Down to switch models.
Right-click for Copy Full Path or Save Screenshot. Right-click a folder to capture screenshots for all models under it.
Right-click a tree item and choose Copy Full Path to copy it to the clipboard.

id: スクリーンショット保存
